duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain a book of residual income through strategic business-to-business sales efforts.
Identify and pursue potential business leads, prioritizing opportunities and managing multiple touch points simultaneously.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and portfolio building to promote and sell products and services to business owners.
Maintain client relationships and focus on client acquisition for future revenue growth.
Communicate compellingly and persistently to bring concepts to life and drive revenue growth.
Participate in critical business discussions to solve business owners' problems and promote services.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to facilitate client acquisition.
Participate in all aspects of publishing and receive training and support in the role.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or related field (Master's preferred)
